page.title: 13The Patchway Gypsy Camp
page.content: "I think the gypsy camp is a messy, dirty place. I would be glad if they moved. Once they tried to move onto the field outside our school. In 1977 there was a protest about them by the community centre." "They are untidy and I think its a bit sad that they can't roam the country like they used to, and I would like them to educate their children more," "They should have their own houses and shops instead of using ours because they make the place smell" "They're dirty and smelly and they take things apart, they steal things and they're cruel to their horses." "I think gypsies are thieves and very dirty and they never pay their taxes. They have lots of money and a lot of horses."
